description.narrative: The project is developed to respond to the capacity building needs of FCA?s local partners in order to achieve efficiency and results in our development projects.The objective of the project is to improve the capacity of local partners of FCA in DRC to pla n and implement humanitarian, development and advocacy activities with improved quality and impacts.The project will consist of various training and other capacity building activities for the local partners of FCA in DRC. The priority areas of capacity bui lding in 2015 are monitoring, evaluation and reporting, communication and Results Based Project Management. FCA will use both its own staff and external experts to implement the capacity building activities. The capacity building project is also designed t o respond to immediate capacity building needs.
